margin.comment: The value for padding applied to fieldset elements.

narrow-max-width.comment: The value used for the maximum width of an icon container using the .sprk-b-InputContainer__icon-container--narrow modifier.

huge-max-width.comment: The max-width setting for Huge Inputs.

max-width.comment: The value used as a maximum width for Input containers.

max-width-full.comment: The value used for the maximum width of an Input container using the .sprk-b-InputContainer--full modifier.

error-focus-label-color.comment: The label color value of Huge Inputs when they have an error.

complete-label-color.comment: The label color when the Huge Input has a value and is not focused.

height.comment: The height value for Huge Inputs.

font-size.comment: The font size for Huge Inputs.

label-font-size.comment: The label font size for Huge Inputs.

label-top.comment: The top value for Huge Input labels. This adjusts how far the label is from the top of the container.

active-label-top.comment: The top value for Huge Input labels when they are active. This adjusts how far the label is from the top of the container.

active-padding-top.comment: The padding top value of active Huge Inputs.

border-width.comment: The border width for Huge Inputs.

label-padding.comment: The label padding for Huge Inputs.

border-width.comment: The border width for Huge Inputs on focus.

label-color.comment: The label color value of Huge Inputs on focus.

transition.comment: The transition value for Huge Inputs.

transition-delay.comment: The transition delay value for Huge Inputs.

placeholder-transition-delay.comment: The transition delay placeholder value for Huge Inputs.

placeholder-transition-property.comment: The transition property placeholder value for Huge Inputs.

placeholder-opacity.comment: The placeholder opacity value for Huge Inputs.

active-placeholder-opacity.comment: The placeholder opacity value for Huge Inputs.

box-shadow.comment: The box shadow value on Huge Inputs.

icon-offset-y.comment: The margin-top value for icons in Huge Inputs.

icon-offset-top.comment: The top value for icons in Huge Inputs.

color.comment: Value for color on Inputs with errors.

line-height.comment: The line height used for Input error text.

margin.comment: The margin used for Input error text.

family.comment: The font family used for Input error text.

size.comment: The font size used for Input error text.

weight.comment: The font weight used for Input error text.

error-container-margin.comment: The margin for Input containers that have an error.

monetary-symbol.comment: The symbol used to denote currency for Monetary Inputs.

fieldset-padding.comment: The value for padding applied to fieldset elements.

label-color.comment: Todo deprecate, The label color value of Huge Inputs on focus.

has-text-icon-padding.comment: The padding value for Huge Inputs with icons.

error-color.comment: Color setting for Inputs with errors.

line-height.comment: The line height setting for Inputs.

border-radius.comment: The border radius setting for Inputs.

box-shadow.comment: The box shadow setting for Inputs.

focus-border-color.comment: The border color on Inputs when focused.

error-border-color.comment: The border color on Inputs when there is an error.

disabled-border-color.comment: The border color on disabled Inputs.

readonly-border-color.comment: The border color on readonly Inputs.

disabled-background-color.comment: The background color on disabled Inputs.

disabled-box-shadow.comment: The box shadow on disabled Inputs.

padding-right.comment: The padding right for Huge Inputs.

icon-margin-top.comment: The margin-top value for icons in Huge Select Inputs.

appearance.comment: The value for the appearance property for Selects.

line-height.comment: The line height setting for Selects.

border-radius.comment: The border radius setting for Selects.

box-shadow.comment: The box shadow setting for Selects.

focus-border-color.comment: The border color on Selects when focused.

error-border-color.comment: The border color on Selects when there is an error.

disabled-border-color.comment: The border color on disabled Selects.

moz-focusring-color.comment: The value for the Firefox specific -moz-focusring color setting.

moz-focusring-text-shadow.comment: The value for the Firefox specific -moz-focusring text-shadow setting.

disabled-background-color.comment: The background color on disabled Selects.

arrow-offset-y.comment: The value for margin-top on the icon in Selects.

arrow-offset-x.comment: The value for margin-right on the icon in Selects.

input-opacity.comment: The opacity of the native control checkbox.

transition.comment: The transition of the huge checkbox input.

border.comment: The border settings of the huge checkbox input.

border-radius.comment: he border-radius of the huge checkbox input.

padding.comment: The padding of the huge checkbox input.

flex-basis.comment: The flex-basis of the huge checkbox input.

line-height.comment: The line height of the huge checkbox input.

hover-border-color.comment: The border color of the huge checkbox input when hovered.

hover-box-shadow.comment: The box shadow of the huge checkbox input when hovered.

disabled-border-color.comment: The border color of the huge checkbox input when disabled.

disabled-box-shadow.comment: The box shadow of the huge checkbox input when disabled.

disabled-background.comment: The background of the huge checkbox input when disabled.

focus-border-color.comment: The border color of the huge checkbox input when focused.

focus-hover-border-color.comment: The border color of the huge checkbox input when focused and hovered.

checked-border-color.comment: The border color of the huge checkbox input when checked.

checked-hover-border-color.comment: The border color of the huge checkbox input when checked and hovered.

input-huge-max-width.comment: The max-width of the huge checkbox input.

transition.comment: The transition for the checkbox when the input is checked or unchecked.

height.comment: The height of the custom checkbox input.

width.comment: The width of the custom checkbox input.

border.comment: The border of the custom checkbox input.

border-focus.comment: The border of the custom checkbox input when focused.

border-focus-checked.comment: The border of the custom checkbox input when it is checked and focused.

background-color-focus.comment: The background of the custom checkbox input when focused.

background-color-hover.comment: The background color of the custom checkbox input when hovered.

background-color-checked.comment: The background color of the custom checkbox input when checked.

background-color-disabled.comment: The background color of the custom checkbox input when disabled.

border-color-checked.comment: The border color of the custom checkbox input when checked.

border-color-hover.comment: The border color of the custom checkbox input when hovered.

border-color-disabled.comment: The border color of the custom checkbox input when disabled.

cursor-disabled.comment: The cursor for the custom checkbox input when disabled..

top.comment: The top positioning of the custom checkbox input.

left.comment: The left positioning of the custom checkbox input.

width.comment: The width of the custom checkbox element of the huge checkbox input.

top.comment: The top value of the custom checkbox element of the huge checkbox input..

width.comment: The width of the huge checkmark icon.

width.comment: The width of the checkmark icon.

left.comment: The left positioning of the checkmark icon.

border-left.comment: The border settings to create the bottom portion of the checkmark.

border-bottom.comment: The border settings to create the right portion of the checkmark.

transform.comment: The rotation setting to create the checkmark.

margin.comment: The margin of the helper text for Inputs.
